title: The Shadow
description: When Chase is thrust from his life into the unknown, the assassin has no choice but to move forward. With only the help of his best friend, Chase desperately embarks on a journey in search of answers. The road forward is full of horrors and dangers beyond the young manâ€™s wildest dreams. Pulled to an unseen destiny, Chase will find that everything he knows about the world, and his life in Rakksberg, is mistaken.
author: Zach Otto
